short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set a custom notification sound for WhatsApp!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of the default WhatsApp notification sound? Now you can change it to any sound of your liking. Install the extension, upload an audio file, then refresh your WhatsApp tab. It's that simple!

Features:
- Easy changing of notification sounds.
- Supports dark mode based on browser preference.
- All uploaded audio is stored locally. No data ever leaves your device.

***

Open source under the GPLv3 license.
Source Code:
https://github.com/mejia-dev/WhatsApp-Notification-Sound-Changer
